com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.drawable.overlay

Class PlayerDestructionOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.drawable.overlay.PlayerDestructionOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Overlay

    public class PlayerDestructionOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay
    PlayerDestructionOverlay Object.

    Overlay shown when the player is destroyed.

    Displays all explosion animation and when finished, reset all information and restart the level

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alejandro Santiago
